FULL FIGHT VIDEO: The KKK Gets Beat Up in Anaheim - YouTube
posts.extended: WARNING: Graphic video and language.Twelve people were arrested, and three people were stabbed, including one man possibly stabbed with a Confederate flag, when the Ku Klux Klan held a rally at an Anaheim, California park. The event did not go well for the Klan on Saturday, February 27th. A handful
